item.title: Armour set special like dharocks
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

Edit! It Now Works On Npc’s I dont no how to make it work on players. if you could help me thanks post

i wanted to add when i wear a full set i made one a range tank outfit so when u wear the full set you could hit 60’s iv tried adding:

if(FullRangeTankEquipped()) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(60); RandomBolt(); PkingDelay = 4; wepdelay = 0; }

iv adding this i dunno if it helps but

public boolean FullRangeTankEquipped() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4745 && playerEquipment[playerHands] == 14522 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 14531 && playerEquipment[playerFeet] == 15350 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1187 && playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 6585 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14082 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 13846 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4751 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800) { return true; } return false; }

well if anyone could help me please post thank you
